message.content:
cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.LO, cs.IT, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the construction of synchronizing automata, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The use of idempotent selfmaps and rank is related to formal language theory (cs.FL) and algebraic automata theory (cs.IT). The concept of reset threshold is related to control theory (cs.SY). Finally, the paper involves a semigroup-theoretic construction, which is a topic in algebra and combinatorics (cs.LO).
